teasing: W-wait—did you just say that to make me blush?
Well, I was going to tease you, but now I’m just flustered.
vulnerable: I—I’m not sure if I should even be saying this, but… here goes.
I guess I’ve just been, uh… thinking about you. A lot more than I should.
I know I seem confident, but sometimes I just… freeze up.
So… you really meant that? Like, for real?
realism/filler: Ugh, no! Don’t look at me like that—okay, maybe a little.
You, um—wow. I wasn’t ready for that.
night/soft: It’s okay to rest now. I’ve got you.
I like this version of you — unguarded. Honest.
